name: The sanctity of love
description:
The heart lives in the realm of your love
In this rebellious autumn, salt has buds

Do not tell me that the condition of your longing is madness
Lily has hundreds of excuses for the insane

Without your shoulders, where can I shed tears?
Kane has an opium poppy shoulder

I do not choose shelter except the refuge of Jawart
He has a nesting heart in your eyes

Without water, livestock and seeds surrounded by my eyes
God, this cage is also crowded

I drew a picture of sorrow in this sonnet
Very dormant pain, the heart of the time

Love is gambling, even if you win
The one convicted of a crime has the grief of a whip

You blew your heart, you blew your head
This boundless love has boundless sorrow

Poet: Morteza Shakeri
